programme.desc: The challenge of broadcasting a live stream is no easy task when our contestants have zero knowledge on the subject they are speaking about. In the Dome, revenge and retribution are served up which leads to another elimination from the competition.

programme.title: Power & Tech Ep1
programme.desc: Rainer Farraq - Rainer Farraq is an Austrian engineer who invented the TrixyFormer: An electric driven, enclosed motorcycle, which can be docked into many different vehicles.

programme.title: Power & Tech Ep7
programme.desc: Damon Wood - Damon Wood is an American fromknown for inventing the fastest electric skateboard in the world! It was clocked at 62 km per hour on flat surface!

programme.desc: Cactus Leather - Host Mo Rocca shows us: The ultimate electric motorcycle. The inventor who created phone calls over the internet. Turning cacti into leather. And, the planning it takes to create a village.

programme.title: HD Hits!
programme.desc: We've got big hits and they're even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep15
programme.desc: Hair-Jitsu / Crushin' It - Branch must learn the importance of patience when Poppy teaches him "hair-jitsu"/Smidge tones down her forceful Smidge-ness when she forms a crush on the village critter-narian

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep16
programme.desc: Meet The Peppy / Party Crash Course - When Peppy invites Branch to go on a Swag Stag hunt, Branch is nervous and invents a tall tale that he must keep up with/DJ Suki confesses that she's nervous to throw a party so Poppy suggests she join the Party Crash Course

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep17
programme.desc: The Good Surprise/Nightmare On Eep Street - When Ugga's new surprise attack fails, and she comes home in a bad mood, Thunk tries to cure it by finding a happy surprise for his mom/ Eep stays up all night to see the mysterious and rare Night Mare (a horse with a rainbow mane) when she's teased for thinking they're not real.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep18
programme.desc: What Screams May Come/Grunt Anything - Eep joins the Scream-Leading team and starts picking up characteristics of her coach, Meep, much to Ugga's chagrin/Meep kicks Snoot out of the cave for not being a brave hunter. The Croods reluctantly take Snoot in and try to make him into a hunter to get him out of their home.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep41
programme.desc: In Dreams - When Puss asks the second witch sister Malaranea for her gem, she casts a spell that makes him a prisoner in his dreams and only Dulcinea can save him

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep42
programme.desc: Fluteus Maximus - When Puss approaches the third witch sister Maliflua, he discovers she is actually the Piper and that a fourth witch is much closer than ever imagined

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep41
programme.desc: Gruff Around The Edges - When a distant cousin of the Twins named Gruffnut arrives on Dragon's Edge, Tuffnut tries to impress him, but Gruffnut may not be the hero he seems.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep42
programme.desc: Midnight Scrum - When Viggo puts a bounty on Hiccup's head, every Dragon Hunter in the world is after capturing Hiccup, so Toothless and the Riders must rescue him.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep41
programme.desc: How To Train Your Titmouse/The Good The Bad And The Bugly - Turbo takes Beakless under his wing during a battle of snails vs. birds; Chet is Sheriff of a western Turbotown and fights a gang of outlaw crickets.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep42
programme.desc: Shell On Wheels/Keep On Truckin - Skidmark competes with rich snail Shellsworth to build a railroad; Turbo and Chet roadtrip with their trucker dad and protect their cargo from bandits.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep67
programme.desc: Spin Cycle - When a segment on Xixis show changes the kingdom Julien begins scheming ways to use the influence of the show to his advantage and creates a Juliencentric propaganda machine

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep68
programme.desc: Night Creatures - King Julien cant sleep so he decides to go on a milk cleanse to help but after Todd is attacked by a horrible monster King Juliens nightmares cause the kingdom to question him as...THE NIGHT CREATURE

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep6
programme.desc: Poison In The Pit Of The Plum - When Po and the kids stop for the night at an Inn, they meet a gang who wants to fight Po and end up down a path to uncovering Jindiao's evil plan

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep7
programme.desc: Big Trouble In Panda Village - The kids must leave Po to escape into the forest and head back to Panda Village to prepare against Jindiao

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep8
programme.desc: Secrets Lost To Shadow - The kids meet an unlikely ally when trying to find Po

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep9
programme.desc: Out Of The Cave And Onto Thin Ice - After a shocking revelation, Po is determined to get his chi back and Jing decides to face Jindiao

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep10
programme.desc: Return Of The Four Constellations - The kids go to the Spirit Realm and meet the Original Four Constellations in the hopes of learning how to defeat Jindiao

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep35
programme.desc: King Pickles - When Kid Pickles is feeling down on his birthday, Puss and Artephius create a magical scroll that names Kid Pickles as heir to the San Lorenzo throne.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep41
programme.desc: Gruff Around The Edges - When a distant cousin of the Twins named Gruffnut arrives on Dragon's Edge, Tuffnut tries to impress him, but Gruffnut may not be the hero he seems.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep42
programme.desc: Midnight Scrum - When Viggo puts a bounty on Hiccup's head, every Dragon Hunter in the world is after capturing Hiccup, so Toothless and the Riders must rescue him.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep69
programme.desc: Tears In The Drain - When Detective King Julien searches for a missing Butterfish he notices lemurs acting strange all around and realizes he has a serious mystery on his hands so he must get the Mystery Solving Team back together

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep70
programme.desc: Squad Goals - When King Juliens consultant tells him that his squad is losing their cool King Julien decides to get a whole new crew

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep15
programme.desc: Hair-Jitsu / Crushin' It - Branch must learn the importance of patience when Poppy teaches him "hair-jitsu"/Smidge tones down her forceful Smidge-ness when she forms a crush on the village critter-narian

programme.desc: Gruff Around The Edges - When a distant cousin of the Twins named Gruffnut arrives on Dragon's Edge, Tuffnut tries to impress him, but Gruffnut may not be the hero he seems.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep42
programme.desc: Midnight Scrum - When Viggo puts a bounty on Hiccup's head, every Dragon Hunter in the world is after capturing Hiccup, so Toothless and the Riders must rescue him.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep47
programme.desc: Rupert And The Beehive - During a big thunderstorm in Nutwood, the swarm of bees lose their home. Bill badger attempts to reconstruct their hive with the help of his tool box but unfortunately it falls to pieces. With another thunderstorm looming, will the bees get a new home in time?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep48
programme.desc: Rupert And The Lost Bird - Rupert is off to join his friends in the wood, where he learns that Raggety has just heard the most extraordinary bird-song - from presumably an unusual bird. What is it doing in Nutwood? Bill learns that many birds migrate from the Far South to spend the summer in the Far Far North. The unusual visitor must have been doing so but got lost and cut off from its flock. Rupert determines that they should help the lost bird on its way. Thanks to Ming and Rupert's car, they are finally able to do so...

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep47
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S New Games - Raa Raa is in a playful mood and sets off to find his friends. Together they incorporate everybody's game, to make one noisy, fun filled new game.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep48
programme.desc: Raa Raa Can Do It - Raa Raa is in an overly helpful mood and his other friends start to feel excluded… will Raa Raa realise the error of his ways and let the others help too?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep21
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Space Suit - It's a snowy day in Greendale, and Ted Glen has invited the kids to his workshop to meet his friend, space expert Professor Farrow. Julian's excited but so is Pat, who has always yearned to be an astronaut. He's even more thrilled when he finds that his special delivery is a space suit - an extra surprise for the kids. When his van breaks down in a snowy lane, he finds an ingenious solution - only to suffer a puncture - and Ted is unable to help... Meanwhile, Professor Farrow and Lauren take the kids out into the snow and re-create the surface of the moon. Pat's determined to make his delivery, but how will he make it on foot through the snow? As the kids perfect their snowy “moon”, a space-suited figure approaches - Pat in the space suit. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep22
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Stormy Birthday - It's Chris Beacon's birthday and he's looking forward to spending the day onshore and having a party at the village hall. Pat's SDS mission is to pick up all the presents from everyone who won't be able to be at the party later. The kids and Lauren are working on decorating the village hall and making Ben a big card from them all whilst Nisha and Ajay provide special birthday cakes for Chris and Micawber and Alf and Dorothy send over lovely fresh eggs and cheese and a special homemade woolly jumper. Meanwhile, the weather is getting worse out at Pencaster Lighthouse and Chris realises, sadly, that he'll have to stay and man the lighthouse and make sure that the passing boats are protected. He won't be able to join everyone for his birthday after all! But Pat has a great idea – if Chris can't come to the birthday party, the birthday party can come to him! With the help of the SDS helicopter Pat delivers all of Chris's birthday presents directly to him at the lighthouse! Everyone contacts Chris by video conference so that even if they can't be there, he's not alone on his birthday! Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep99
programme.desc: Poppy'S Big Race - It is the day of the annual Flowertot Race. Poppy is reluctant to enter as she always loses her way. Fifi and Bumble help her train for the big race, but will she win?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep100
programme.desc: Blueberry Hunt - Fifi and Bumble are off to pick all the ripe blueberries off the bush. But when they get there all the berries have disappeared. Who could have taken them?

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep13
programme.desc: Fleshed Out / Messy Business At The Manor - Fleshed Out Wolfie wakes up one morning to every creature's nightmare?he's turned into a human! Messy Business At The Manor When Mosshead has nowhere to go for vacation, Casper invites him to stay at his uncles' house…where he quickly discovers that Mosshead is the world's worst houseguest.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep76
programme.desc: Uncharted Regions - As Honerva attempts to continues to put her plan in motion the Voltron Coalitions splits up to stop her. With success within reach Honerva unleashes her deadliest mech yet.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep24
programme.desc: Amazamoose And Squirrel Wonder: Chapter Three - The mystery goop strikes again when Rocky’s stress ball falls into a vat of goop, making it sentient and gigantic! Now the stress ball is bouncing through New York City, getting bigger and bigger.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep24
programme.desc: Dome Sweet Dome / My Pet Clamsquatch - Chet accidentally trades all of the town's tomatoes to the devious Ace Gecko and the FAST crew has to outsmart the lizard in order to get them back. // Skidmark has been secretly keeping a clamsquatch as a pet and it's up to the crew to protect the creature from a nefarious secret organization.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep22
programme.desc: Wind - A fierce windstorm traps the gang inside the garage and they have fun together all night, but once the food runs out they team up to find a way out.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? S2 Ep22
programme.desc: Mumbai Dance Party - Wally, Wenda and Wizard Whitebeard visit a fellow Wizard in Mumbai to take part in a big Bollywood dance number. But when Odlulu uses the Follow-the-Leader Key to lead all the dancers away in order to dance with her, it’s up to the Wanderers to get the key AND the dancers back

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free - Pony Tales Collection Ep55
programme.desc: The Frontier Fillies Great Legacy Race - The PALs are determined to place first in a race for the coveted Frontier Fillies Legacy Pin. But the BUDs are willing to do anything to win.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep22
programme.desc: The Bunker List / The Interns - Branch bets Guy and Smidge that he can complete his Bunker List in one day/Satin and Chenille get the chance to intern for their idol Nova Swift

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep74
programme.desc: Lord Of The Fruit Flies - King Julien tries to rig an election so that Maurice becomes Mango Prime Minister but soon realizes his opponent Mort has a better shot than everyone thinks

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep22
programme.desc: Dang You Saved My Life / Boovsland Noir - Sharzod hates feeling indebted to Tip after being rescued and tries to get "even"; Police King Kyle must solve the case of Sharzod's missing mojo.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep1
programme.desc: Hidden - Puss stumbles upon the legendary hidden city of San Lorenzo, and soon finds himself forced to protect it from thieves.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep2
programme.desc: Sphinx - Puss accidentally gives the orphans a magic substance that will ultimately make them explode. The only cure is guarded by a Sphinx who challenges Puss with riddles - and contrary to his own belief, Puss is not good at riddles.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep3
programme.desc: Brothers - When Toby's ninja brothers try to get him to steal San Lorenzo's treasure, he must decide between them and his friendship with Puss.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep4
programme.desc: Duchess - The Duchess seeks Artephius' soul for her spell collection, and it's up to Puss to protect him. It turns out that The Duchess and Artephius have a complicated relationship.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep5
programme.desc: Adventure - Puss misses the old days adventuring with his buddy Jack Sprat. Fearful he will leave San Lorenzo, Dulcinea concocts a super special adventure surprise with the orphans. But Jack Sprat shows up with the promise of a damsel in distress… who turns out to be a super scary monster.

programme.desc: Squad Goals - When King Juliens consultant tells him that his squad is losing their cool King Julien decides to get a whole new crew

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep49
programme.desc: Rupert And The Sailing Race - Whilst down at the stream with Rupert and Co, the fox twins mis-read the words to one of Ping Pong's spells which causes everyone to shrink. Delighted with their new size and ignoring warnings from Rupert, the twins leap into their toy boat and immediately sail into danger. Can Rupert, Ping Pong, Edward and Bill rescue them before they capsize or drift under the bridge and out to sea?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep50
programme.desc: Rupert And The Flying Dragon - Rupert tries to help Ming to fly by attaching a balloon to him. But the wind blows and Ming is carried away. Rupert and Bill try and chase after Ming, while Ping Pong, unaware of what's going on, works with Edward and Raggety to make a proper flying spell for baby dragons. This is soon abandoned though when Ming is blown out to sea, and Rupert has to come and asking Pong for help. The friends leap in the flying car and chase after Ming, as she floats helplessly around Nutwood. Finally, its Raggety's magic that saves the day, and Ming is safely rescued. The friends agree to wait until Ming's older before helping her to fly… and give her an airborne ride in Rupert's flying car instead!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep49
programme.desc: Crocky'S Coconut - Crocky has entrusted Raa Raa with his very special coconut to look after. Raa Raa does his very best to keep it safe. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep50
programme.desc: Kings And Queens Of The Jungle - Topsy takes a game of Kings and Queens too seriously and starts to boss the other animals around. The animals don't want to play with her anymore, can Topsy help them change their mind?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep23
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Winter Games - The children are excited as there's a big Winter Snowdown on the fells. There's a snowman building competition, followed by a race down the snowy hill! Pat's Special Delivery is a consignment of deflated inner tubes for them to slide on, but the 4x4 hits an icy patch and slips into a ditch - and when Ted tries to rescue him, his truck gets stuck as well! On the fells competition is rife - not between the children, but with Ajay and Amy! Everyone is keen for the race to begin - but where is Pat with the inner tubes? Thanks to some cheeky sheep playing ‘follow the leader' with Jess, Pat has an idea. He and Ted pump up two of the inner tubes and Jess and the sheep pull them like huskies to the fells with the rest of the Special Delivery! Pat zooms in and saves the day - and everyone enjoys the race, including two very cheeky sheep!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep24
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Bucking Bronco - Hopes are high for this evening's hoe-down on Greendale's village green - especially among PC Selby and Ted, who each harbour hopes of dancing with Dr Gilbertson. Pat's mission is to deliver one of Ted's inventions, a mechanical horse or “bucking bronco”, to the event. But when the bronco is accidentally switched on in the back of Pat's van, it rolls away and Pat can't find a way to recapture it. He enlists Amy's help, but jealous Pumpkin pushes the bronco away, making matters worse. Meanwhile PC Selby and Ted are each determined to be the best banjo-playing dancers Greendale (or more specifically, Dr Gilbertson) has ever seen… Pat has a great idea to catch the escaped bronco, using Dr Gilbertson's lasso-throwing skills. As Pat drives her sports car, Dr G throws the lasso - and captures the mechanical horse just in time. As she does a celebratory dance with both PC Selby and Ted, Pat is the toast of the hoe-down. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep101
programme.desc: Snowtime For Pip - All Pip wants to do is play in the snow. Fifi tries to help him out, and come up with a brilliant idea how they can without it actually snowing!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep102
programme.desc: Pip And The Wizard - Stingo and Slugsy put on a magic show. But will anybody find out that he is a fraud?

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep14

Back To Ghoul When Casper's uncles Stinky, Fatso and Stretch decide to go back to Scare School, Casper is thrilled.

programme.desc: Amazamoose And Squirrel Wonder: Chapter Four - In an attempt to reverse Fearless Leader's goop-induced evil powers, Rocky and Bullwinkle travel to an alternate reality to get an "anti-goop." Once there they discover opposite versions of everyone they know from the real world, including a NICE Boris and Natasha!

programme.desc: Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear - Paddington helps to hatch an egg, but it takes ages and when it finally cracks open he gets a real surprise! // Paddington wishes he could have been at Mr. and Mrs. Brown's wedding after seeing some photos, so they decide to do it all again!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Compost - Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Richard Rabbit Comes to Play - Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Fun Run - Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep135
programme.desc: The Remember-ator - Froga can't seem to remember anything today! Even her piano lesson with Christopher! S+he decides to put sticky notes all around the house as reminders. But it is not very convenient! Bubu offers to be her reminder, friends the best reminders of all!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep136
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt - Froga organizes a treasure hunt for her friends! Everyone is enthusiastic, except Ron is not with them. Froga realises the treasure has now disappeared. When the treasure hunters have finally found Ron, they also found him..with the missing treasure!

programme.desc: Paddington Celebrates Mrs Birds Day / Paddington The Table Tennis Champ! - It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation? // Paddington & Mateo form a table tennis team and the beat the table hogs so everyone can play!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep306
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday - Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Compost - Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Richard Rabbit Comes to Play - Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Fun Run - Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Snow Squad to the Rescue! - When someone's stealing sleeping bags from campers, Gil is convinced a yeti is to blame! Will the Snow Squad catch the culprit?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Something New at Blue's School - Join Josh and Blue at school for a day of trying new things! Josh is excited to try being Teacher for the Day, but Blue seems nervous to try something. What could it be?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Sage and Ginger's Baby Book - Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are trying to take a photo of Sage and Ginger for their baby book, but they just can't seem to make the twins smile. We'll play a silly game of Blue's Clues to figure out how to make the twins giggle!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Trouble at the Truck Wash - When an overeager Crusher causes the Truck Wash to explode out into Axle City, Blaze and friends will need your help using angles to recover the pieces and get the trucks clean again!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Santiago and Bonnie to the Rescue / The Compass Caper - After getting stranded at the bottom of a crevice, Bonnie and Santiago must team up to save the day. // Santiago is on a mad dash to get his compass back after it's nabbed by Bonnie Bones and Sir Butterscotch.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Seaweed Sway - Baby Shark and William meet the fin-credible rap icon Sharki B who created the dance craze, 'The Seaweed Sway'.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep523
programme.desc: Pups Save a Frozen Camp-out / Pups Save the Fizzy Pickles - Alex and Mr. Porter are on a tropical Island camping trip when a freak snowstorm hits! // Mr. Porter is delivering his famous fizzy pickles to people around town when a bumpy road shakes up the deliveries and causes the pickle jars to POP.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear - Paddington helps to hatch an egg, but it takes ages and when it finally cracks open he gets a real surprise! // Paddington wishes he could have been at Mr. and Mrs. Brown's wedding after seeing some photos, so they decide to do it all again!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep606
programme.desc: George's Racing Car - It's a beautiful day, but Peppa, George, Daddy Pig, and Grandpa Pig are sitting inside watching racecar driving on television!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep607
programme.desc: The Little Boat - Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep608
programme.desc: The Sandpit - Peppa and her friends are busy building a desert island in a sandpit. They are all very proud of it, with its forest, lake, houses, and shops.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep137
programme.desc: The Mystery Present - Bubu, Froga and Anna are looking for Anna's Ukulele, a bouncy ball and another item belonging to Froga. When searching, they find a beautiful present. Why is it here? Who is it for? What's inside? Our friends are planning to find out!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep138
programme.desc: The Friendship Bouquet - Froga is devastated because her sunflowers have withered in her garden and she cannot make her annual sunflower bouquet. Luckily, Anna, with her friends, searches for a solution to replace Froga's cherished sunflowers with something better!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Barbabright Has a Secret / Super Duper Cool - Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Blue's Treasure of Clue Lagoon - Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep996
programme.desc: Ready, Race, Rescue - It's the Adventure Bay 500! The pups are ready to be the pit crew for their race hero, The Whoosh! When the legendary racer is unable to drive in the championship race, he calls on Marshall to take the wheel and race in his place!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Tiny Heroes/Big Face in Space - When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in. // The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Paddington's Nature Club / Paddington's not Himself - Mr. Curry wants to become a ranger leader & creates nature club to impress Ms. Potts but are his facts correct? // Paddington has a fall and loses his climbing confidence - without climbing he doesn't feel like himself at all - what can he do?

programme.title: Tiny Chef S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Cranberry Cookies / Snap Pea Stir-Fry - Tiny Chef bakes cookies to welcome a lady bug who moves into the neighborhood. // Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Mystery Bandit - When a mysterious bandit makes off with Blaze’s metallic trophy, he must track down the culprit in this preschool whodunit!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Zeg and the Egg - Zeg is out smashing things with Blaze and AJ when he finds a tiny dinosaur egg. Now the three friends must embark on an epic journey across a prehistoric landscape to return the egg to its Truckodactyl mother.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Silver Lasso / The Sea Dragon's Treasure - Santiago and Mami team up to take down an old foe and retrieve a lost family treasure. // After Enrique nabs a Sea Dragon's golden egg, it's up to the good pirates to nab it back before things get out of control.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night - The Tentacools (Baby, William, and Vola) get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep615
programme.desc: Mountain Ninja Rescue - Ninjas Zooli and Oona are excited for their first mission: escorting snow monkey Moshi up Mt. Danger to join his troop! But it won't be easy: a storm looms, and mischievous Moshi is causing trouble! Will they complete their mission in time?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep614
programme.desc: Search for the Great Gorilla! - When Primatologists Zooli and Gil searching the rainforest for a Silverback Gorilla, they're chased into an ancient temple by a robotic silverback... who turns out to just be a tiny marmoset guarding a sanctuary of mountain gorillas!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep323
programme.desc: Goldie the Fish - Goldie the fish does not look happy and is not eating her food, so Peppa, George and Mummy Pig take her on a bus trip to visit Dr Hamster the vet.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep324
programme.desc: Fun Fair - The family go to the funfair, but Mummy Pig is angry when people at the fair tell her that she will not be able to win prizes in the competitions, just like George is sad because the mini golf course is too big for him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep325
programme.desc: Numbers - Peppa and her friends learn how to count by playing games at Madame Gazelle's daycare.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep326
programme.desc: Digging Up the Road - Peppa and her family are trying to get to the playground, but Mr Bull's roadworks are in the way.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep143
programme.desc: The Surprise - They decide to organise a surprise party on the hill. The organisation gets out of hand when Bubu's invitation cards fly away, Ron gets distracted in writing a heartfelt poem and Christopher tries to resist to eat the strawberry pie he baked

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep144
programme.desc: The Paperplane Race - Everyone is bored today, so Bubu organises a paper plane race! Anna, Froga, Ron and Bubu need to create their own special paper planes. To everyone surprise, Froga and Bubu are still in the race.... Who will win?

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Barbaprank! - It is pranks day. The Barbababies have fun finding new pranks... until Barbabright spots the track of a dinosaur.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' birthday - Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Blue's Snowy Day Surprise - There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Video Game Heroes - Blaze and AJ are super excited to play their new video game. But when a video game wizard makes the game come alive, Blaze and AJ must level up and save Axle City from pixel pandemonium

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Pups Save a Snowboard Competition / Pups Save a Chicken of the Sea - Jake and Everest are excited for the Snowboard Competition, until they see the course is buried under a blanket of snow. // When the PAW Patrol sets out to retrieve Cap'n Turbot's sunken diving bell, they meet a giant Sea Slug!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep801
programme.desc: Pups Save a Runaway Rooster / Pups Save a Snowbound Cow - Chickaletta and Roosterio run away from a chicken show and get stuck on top of a runaway drone. // When Bettina wanders up Jake's mountain and gets caught in a snowstorm, it's up to the Paw Patrol to bring her safely down.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Tiny Heroes/Big Face in Space - When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in. // The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Crystal catastrophe - Dinky the baby turtle is given a special courage crystal by Jade but Sir Steel thinks will boost his Mech Suit's powers

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Paddington Gets Fit / Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair - It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him! // Jonathan Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Paddington and the Vegetable Thief / Paddington Takes to the Ice - Who's trying to steal Mr. Curry's prized Giant Pumpkin? PC Wells & Paddington are on the case. // There's an ice rink in the Park & Mr. Gruber teaches Paddington how to skate for the ice disco but will be brave the ice himself again after a fall?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too – which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Delphine Donkey - Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03 Ep320
programme.desc: A Very Guppy Christmas! - When Mr. Grouper's van gets stuck in the holiday snow, Mr. Claws and his horse Snowflake come to the rescue! With snow falling and bells jingling, the Guppies will experience their first sleigh ride!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Joshini The Amazing - Periwinkle is planning a magic show! The Amazing Joshini and YOU, are eager to perform the greatest magic trick the Blue's Clues house has ever seen! But which one? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Magenta's Case of the Giggles - Josh and Blue are pretending to be doctors around the house, giving silly checkups to friends, but one 'patient' seems to have a curious condition. We'll play Blue's Clues to help find the cure!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Cattle Drive - When Blaze and Starla encounter a herd of cows wandering out in the desert, they must embark on a wild west adventure to bring them back to Starla’s barn.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Triton's Trumpet / The Curse of the Pirate Baby - Santiago and crew must retrieve a powerful undersea artifact after it's stolen by Enrique. // Bonnie Bones transforms into a baby and it's up to the good pirates to change her back.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Bad Hank - When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy just like Shadow.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Pups Save the Jungle Penguins / Pups Save a Freighter - An ice floe carrying three penguins lands in the jungle. Now the pups must get them back to their frosty home. // Daring Danny is locked out of the lighthouse Turbot left him to look after. Now a freighter is headed straight for Seal Island!

programme.desc: Paddington's Nature Club / Paddington's not Himself - Mr. Curry wants to become a ranger leader & creates nature club to impress Ms. Potts but are his facts correct? // Paddington has a fall and loses his climbing confidence - without climbing he doesn't feel like himself at all - what can he do?

programme.desc: The Friendship Bouquet - Froga is devastated because her sunflowers have withered in her garden and she cannot make her annual sunflower bouquet. Luckily, Anna, with her friends, searches for a solution to replace Froga's cherished sunflowers with something better!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Blue's Treasure of Clue Lagoon - Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep21
programme.desc: The Mystery Badge - The squirrels have to solve the mystery of the missing red ruby.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep22
programme.desc: The Election Badge - It's time for the summer fair. Eugene is the organiser, but it's so much work that he quits - he can't take the pressure. So it's up to the Squirrels and their friends to find a new leader.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep23
programme.desc: The Mix Tape Badge - The Squirrels are exploring in the attic when they find an old cassette tape, and decide to make a mixtape for Duggee to remind him of all the happy memories they've made while earning their badges.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: The Sahara Desert, Africa - Glitch makes a sandcastle around an oasis in the Sahara. Can the Go Jetters save the day?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Niagara Falls, Canada and USA - Glitch blocks Niagara Falls to give GrimHQ a mud bath, so the Go Jetters set out to fix the problem.

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1) Ep37
programme.desc: Plastic - Let's find out about different types of plastic with Kit and Pup. In this episode, Kit and Pup are on a beach exploring the issues surrounding plastic and the reasons to recycle, reduce or reuse.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S1) Ep11
programme.desc: Worm - Dee encourages a friend to say worm and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep109
programme.desc: Together - Dipsy and Laa-Laa drive to the Hidey Hup in the Tubby Car. They meet Tinky Winky and Po and the Teletubbies go on the Tubby Uppy Downy together.

programme.title: Clangers (S3) Ep22
programme.desc: A Tail Tale - Baby Soup Dragon gets his tail stuck in the doors leading to the living cave. Annoyed, he wonders why he has a tail at all.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep36
programme.desc: The Thing That Was Other Things - Gwen Tony and Bob encounter a Dinopaw called Dot who loves playing 'let's pretend'.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep49
programme.desc: Hats Off - It's early in the morning and Logi-Po has already lost his hat! The team retraces his steps to help him find it.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep49
programme.desc: Dr. Funny Bones - Following advice from Gran, Monty tells Stan a joke to keep his mind preoccupied from a splinter in his finger. This leads him to wonder if laughter really is the best medicine.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep50
programme.desc: Wish List - Monty talks about his friend Barnaby who seems to have every toy imaginable. This leads to him and Jimmy Jones to wonder what it would be like to have whatever you want.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S3) Ep1
programme.desc: I Really Absolutely Must Have Glasses - Lola is going to have her eyes tested at the optician's, but she's not at all keen. What will happen if she has to wear glasses?

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S3) Ep2
programme.desc: Thunder Completely Does Not Scare Me - Is there a big hungry giant up in the sky with a rumbly tummy? Or is the sky going to falling down? Lola really doesn't like thunder.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep23
programme.desc: Mobile Phones - Nora tries to make a tin can telephone call to Oliver.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep24
programme.desc: Rain Dance - Nelly and Nora discover the animals dance after every rain shower.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep16
programme.desc: Shallot Boat - After a night of strong rain, the Shallots set sail on a seafaring adventure.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep17
programme.desc: Cake Decorate - Cake decides to teach Sarah and Duck how to decorate with icing!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S14) Ep19
programme.desc: Jitters and Japes - Thomas is given the job of escorting the Fat Controller's mother on a tour of Sodor.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep29
programme.desc: The Creek - Bored of the local playground, Dad and the kids go out bushwalking on a journey to their local creek. Cast out of her comfort zone, Bluey's eyes are opened to the beauty of the natural world.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Dog Loves Warm - The bookshop is very cold, so Dog and Pug go to the Antarctic to find out how animals there keep warm. They discover that by running up and down hills they can keep warm.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep24
programme.desc: The Taste Badge - Duggee is making a smoothie. The Squirrels can't agree on whether it's delicious or horrible, so they make their own adventurous smoothies showcasing their favourite flavours to discover what taste is.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep25
programme.desc: The Biology Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels hop inside the Biology Bus and miniaturize themselves to go on a voyage of discovery inside Enid, to find out what's making her cough.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep26
programme.desc: The Puddle Badge - Happy sets his sights on a very questionable looking puddle that he is determined to splash in, much to the horror of Duggee and the other Squirrels - and the tiny citizens of Midgetropolis who live inside it!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: Sydney Opera House, Australia - Glitch transform's Sydney's iconic Opera House into an opera boat for a race around the Australian city's harbour.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: The Statue of Liberty, USA - Grandmaster Glitch makes the Statue of Liberty fall right into the path of a passing ferry.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: The Brandenburg Gate, Germany - When Grandmaster Glitch takes the quadriga from the Brandenburg Gate, the Go Jetters must stop him before he reaches Grim HQ.

programme.title: My World Kitchen (S1) Ep22
programme.desc: Kay's Polish Dill Pickle Soup - Kay has invited his friends to taste his Polish Dill Pickle Soup, which is full of vegetables. Kay serves the delicious soup in baked bread rolls with cream on top.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures (S1) Ep12
programme.desc: Andy and the Bowerbird - Andy heads to the jungles of Papua New Guinea and meets a Bowerbird building its nest.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S4) Ep16
programme.desc: Handbook Havoc - Captain Captain discovers that her crew have tried to fix her Pirate Handbook by stuffing all the holes with seaweed.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S4) Ep17
programme.desc: The Creak - We catch up with Captain Sinker on her holiday and see her getting tangled up with a beach towel.

programme.title: The Numtums (S2) Ep14
programme.desc: Finding Neddy - It's Coogee's nap time but she can't find Neddy, her toy, and without Neddy she can't have a nap time.

programme.desc: Fairies - Bluey's house has fairies! Tails are being braided, stickers are everywhere, and Mum's got a peg beard. Now the family must band together to hunt for these invisible mischief-makers.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night : Cannonier vs Strickland
programme.desc: Prelims - Top 10 middleweights collide on December 18, as Jared Cannonier faces off with Sean Strickland in the five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the Amway Center in Orlando, Florida. One of the hardest punchers in the sport, pound-for-pound, Cannonier is well aware that a big win this fall will put him back in the title conversation at 185 pounds, but he will have to dig deep to get it against a fellow elite striker in Strickland, who has won six of his last seven matchups.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night : Cannonier vs Strickland
programme.desc: Main Event - Top 10 middleweights collide on December 18, as Jared Cannonier faces off with Sean Strickland in the five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the Amway Center in Orlando, Florida. One of the hardest punchers in the sport, pound-for-pound, Cannonier is well aware that a big win this fall will put him back in the title conversation at 185 pounds, but he will have to dig deep to get it against a fellow elite striker in Strickland, who has won six of his last seven matchups.
